member.name: CBT_CREATEWNDA
member.summary: Contains information passed to a WH_CBT hook procedure, CBTProc, before a window is created.

member.name: CBT_CREATEWNDA.lpcs
member.summary: A pointer to a structure that contains initialization parameters for the window about to be created.

member.name: CBT_CREATEWNDA.hwndInsertAfter
member.summary: A handle to the window whose position in the Z order precedes that of the window being created. This member can also be NULL.
